description: Definition of the trap reported when the ADSL port rate fails to meet the requirement.
If ADSL act rate is lower than threshold, hwTrapType is 1. Otherwise, hwTrapType is 2.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortActRateMonitorTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestTxRate u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestTxRate u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestTxRateThreshold u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestTxRateThreshold u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslLineLatestActiveTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestSnrMgn i 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestSnrMgn i 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestAtn u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestAtn u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestAttainableRate u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestAttainableRate u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestConfTxRate u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestConfTxRate u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestInterleaveDelay u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestInterleaveDelay u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestTargetSnrMgn i 0 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestTargetSnrMgn i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSubslotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwAlarmId i 9999 HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwAlarmTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwAlarmSn i 9999 HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwCauseId i 9999 HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwTrapType i 0

description: Frame Index,the number of the frame in the device.
This table is also adopted by the case-shaped device with Agent
(For example, the MA5105).
There is no frame in this kind of device. Thus it is placed on
the rack with other devices During implementation. The frame index
is specified as 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: Slot index that identifies the physical position of a slot.
The case-shaped device is treated as the one with only one slot whose index is always set as 0.
If there are ports in the frame, all the ports on the frame must be virtualized as
a fixed slot index (equal to the virtual slots which is the max slot index for the frame plus
1.) Their slot index is also fixedly set as 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Port index, the index of this table, which exclusively
determines all the ports in a subboard.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex

description: Actual transmit rate on this channel when latest actived.
Unit: bps
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestTxRate

description: Actual transmit rate on this channel when latest actived.
Unit: bps
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestTxRate

description: Port down stream threshold.
Unit: bps
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestTxRateThreshold

description: Port up stream threshold.
Unit: bps
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestTxRateThreshold

description: Actual time when latest actived.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslLineLatestActiveTime

description: Noise Margin as seen by this ATU-C at the time of the last adslAtucRateChangeTrap event. in tenth dB.
Unit: tenth dB
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestSnrMgn

description: Noise Margin as seen by this ATU-R at the time of the last adslAtucRateChangeTrap event. in tenth dB.
Unit: tenth dB
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestSnrMgn

description: Measured difference in the total power transmitted as seen by this ATU-C at the time of the last adslAtucRateChangeTrap event. in tenth dB.
Unit: tenth dB
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestAtn

description: Measured difference in the total power transmitted as seen by this ATU-R at the time of the last adslAtucRateChangeTrap event. in tenth dB.
Unit: tenth dB
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestAtn

description: Indicates the maximum attainable data rate by the ATU-C at the time of the last adslAtucRateChangeTrap event.
Unit: bps
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestAttainableRate

description: Indicates the maximum attainable data rate by the ATU-R at the time of the last adslAtucRateChangeTrap event.
Unit: bps
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestAttainableRate

description: Configured transmit rate for ADSL port
in bps. See adslAtucConfRateChanRatio for information
regarding RADSL mode and ATUR transmit rate for
ATUC receive rates.
Unit: bps
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestConfTxRate

description: Configured receive rate for ADSL port
in bps. See adslAtucConfRateChanRatio for information
regarding RADSL mode and ATUR transmit rate for
ATUC receive rates.
Unit: bps
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestConfTxRate

description: Interleave Delay for this channel when latest actived.
Unit: milliseconds
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestInterleaveDelay

description: Interleave Delay for this channel when latest actived.
Unit: milliseconds
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestInterleaveDelay

description: Port Signal/Noise Margin.
Range: 0-310
Unit: tenth dB
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAtucLatestTargetSnrMgn

description: Port Signal/Noise Margin.
Range: 0-310
Unit: tenth dB
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslAturLatestTargetSnrMgn

description: Subslot Index. The present subslot index is determined by its
physical position in the board.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSubslotIndex

description: The trap id only valids in the alarm trap Varible binding parameters .
variables.name: HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwAlarmId

description: The trap time only valids in the alarm trap Varible binding parameters .
variables.name: HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwAlarmTime

description: The serial number only valids in the alarm trap Varible binding parameters .
variables.name: HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwAlarmSn

description: The cause for sending a trap .
variables.name: HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwCauseId

description: The trap type .
Options:
1.eventAlarm(0) - Event alarm
2.faultAlarm(1) - Fault alarm
3.clearAlarm(2) - Recovery alarm
4.synAlarm(3) - Synchronization alarm
5.maitainTrap(10) - Maintenance trap
6.topDiscovery(11) - Topology discovery trap
7.debugTrap(12) - Debugging trap
variables.name: HUAWEI-TC-MIB::hwTrapType

description: ADSL act rate is change trap.
This trap message is generated when the ADSL port rate change.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0 HWMUSA-DEV-MIB::hwIasConfigChangeTrapID i 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapIPIAID s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapMUXID s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapTimeStamp c 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapDSLineRate u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapUSLineRate u 9999 HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapEventType s EX HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapDslType s EXAMP

description: Frame Index,the number of the frame in the device.
This table is also adopted by the case-shaped device with Agent
(For example, the MA5105).
There is no frame in this kind of device. Thus it is placed on
the rack with other devices During implementation. The frame index
is specified as 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: Slot index that identifies the physical position of a slot.
The case-shaped device is treated as the one with only one slot whose index is always set as 0.
If there are ports in the frame, all the ports on the frame must be virtualized as
a fixed slot index (equal to the virtual slots which is the max slot index for the frame plus
1.) Their slot index is also fixedly set as 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Port index, the index of this table, which exclusively
determines all the ports in a subboard.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex

description: Configuration change type trap ID.
variables.name: HWMUSA-DEV-MIB::hwIasConfigChangeTrapID

description: The port IPIAID is reported when the port rate changes.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapIPIAID

description: The port MUXID is reported when the port rate changes.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapMUXID

description: The time stamp of Line rate change trap.
Standard Unix format; as the number of seconds since 1/1/1970 (UNIT:Second).
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapTimeStamp

description: Down stream line rate after line rate change.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapDSLineRate

description: Up stream line rate after line rate change.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapUSLineRate

description: Event type reported during the previous change of the rate.
If both the upstream and downstream rates change, this leaf object outputs character string 'DU'.
If only the upstream rates changes, this leaf object outputs character string 'US'.
If only the downstream rates changes, this leaf object outputs character string 'DS'.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapEventType

description: DSL line type of the port whose rate changes.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL-MIB::hwAdslPortRateChangeTrapDslType
